channel.title: Magic Questions; (&more ;])
channel.description:
Hey, thanks for looking at my post. Im having a little bit of trouble with magic, im using a deltascape source.
Im trying to change around the exp you get from alching, the teleporting cords, and casting speed. I have looked through the forums, but there aren't many posts on deltascape.
Any help would be great, and flaming will not be tolerated.
MSN - redeyeballs38@yahoo.com
ANnnnd :], anyone know how to change cords on where u go upon death?
Thankkkkssss :],
-Godschaos

item.title: Magic Questions; (&more ;])
item.dc:creator: @GodsChaos GodsChaos
item.description:
@GodsChaos wrote:

awesome thanks;
what about teleport spells?
i searched the cords for the teles, and changed in client.java but nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Magic Questions; (&more ;])
item.dc:creator: @GodsChaos GodsChaos
item.description:
@GodsChaos wrote:

sweet, earlier i changed the starting point in player.java in there, but i didn’t know that the other cords were as well;
thanks :]

Read full topic

item.title: Magic Questions; (&more ;])
item.dc:creator: @gamma gamma
item.description:
@gamma wrote:

the exp u get from alching, and the timing and stuff would be in your magicMethod somewhere in client.java

and to change the coords of where you start and die. search

// initial x and y coordinates of the player in player.java

and to change the death, die, and get the coords of where you go, and search them in player.java and change them

Read full topic
